mapper.select: select * from pro_infoManage where product_id = #{id} and status = 0
select max(cast(SUBSTRING(product_code,len(product_code)-2,len(product_code)) as INT)) from pro_infoManage where SUBSTRING(product_code,1,len(product_code)-3) =#{ticketNumber}
mapper.insert:
